article.headline: Drake 82, Akron 78 (OT)
article.story: AKRON, Ohio (AP) -- Lonnie Randolph scored 19 points and Nick Grant added 18 to lead Drake to an 82-78 win over Akron in overtime Saturday. Grant, who finished 10-for-14 at the foul line, made 5-of-6 free throws in the final minute of overtime after the Bulldogs (11-13) took a 76-74 lead on David Bancroft's layup with 2:06 remaining. Chaun Brooks added 16 points and eight rebounds for the Bulldogs, who blew a 67-56 lead with 5:07 left in regulation. The Zips (12-12) made three 3-pointers over the final 1:04 of regulation to tie the score 72-all. Dru Joyce III hit two 3s to make it 70-66 and 72-69, and Rick McFadden's 3 with 21 seconds to play tied it up. Joyce III finished with 23 points and made 6-of-12 attempts from 3-point range. McFadden had 15 points and Jeremiah Wood added 15 points and 10 rebounds for Akron. Drake hit 9 of 16 3-point tries and Akron was 9-for-25 behind the arc.
